feed.title: WordPress ActivityPub Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for WordPress ActivityPub: 4.7.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Janitorial: Fix PHP Warnings by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1127
  • Jetpack: Support comment management in Calypso by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1104
  • Post meta: Update meta keys to be private by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1090
  • Account for pre-existing image when adding alt text by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1132
  • Fix function docs by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1138
  • Enable Mastodon Apps: Improve Reply Fetching by @akirk in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1118
  • Tests: Specify port to make tests pass by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1142
  • Bump minimum version to PHP 7.2 by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1139
  • Comments: Show @-mentions in line with reply by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1137
  • Comments: Update counts when (de)activating the plugin by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1128
  • Webfinger: Use Rest Controller structure by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1146
  • Frontend scripts: print options later by @mattwiebe in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1131
  • Application: Use Rest Controller structure by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1145
  • Bump @wordpress/components from 28.13.0 to 29.1.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1150
  • Skip Changelog for Dependabot PRs by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1151
  • Bump ramsey/composer-install from 1 to 3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1152
  • Bump actions/checkout from 2 to 4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1154
  • Bump actions/stale from 8 to 9 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1155
  • Bump actions/setup-node from 3 to 4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1156
  • Release 4.7.0 by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1157

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/compare/4.6.0...4.7.0

entry.title: New release for WordPress ActivityPub: 4.7.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix missing migration for v4.7.0 by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1161

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/compare/4.7.0...4.7.1

entry.title: New release for WordPress ActivityPub: 4.7.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Issue Templates: update bug report template by @jeherve in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1048
  • Bump pat-s/always-upload-cache from 1.1.4 to 3.0.11 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1160
  • Bump softprops/turnstyle from 1 to 2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1153
  • NodeInfo: Use Rest Controller structure by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1144
  • Update users => actors by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1164
  • Interaction: Use Rest Controller structure by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1149
  • Add release script by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1159
  • Add support for WPML post locale by @thomas-pike in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1166
  • Use _activityPubOptions at runtime by @mattwiebe in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1168
  • Migration: flush post caches by @mattwiebe in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1181
  • Release 4.7.2 by @mattwiebe in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1182

New Contributors

  • @thomas-pike made their first contribution in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1166

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/compare/4.7.1...4.7.2

entry.title: New release for WordPress ActivityPub: 4.7.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix rewrite rules for NodeInfo by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1191
  • Release 4.7.3 by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1192

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/compare/4.7.2...4.7.3

entry.title: New release for WordPress ActivityPub: 5.0.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Releases: Replace versions in upgrade scripts by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1179
  • Introduce Query Singleton, to store/query all ActivityPub related informations based on the $wp_query by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1148
  • Remove link to firefish by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1199
  • Actions: Only run tests once by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1207
  • Release Script: Replace @since versions by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1221
  • Check response body for tombstone type (#1209) by @mexon in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1222
  • Fix: Importing tags from the Fediverse by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1234
  • Scripts: Add generic wp-env command by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1238
  • Outbox Collection by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/593
  • Extra Fields: Fix rel me count by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1241
  • Changed: Moved password check to is_post_disabled function. by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1246
  • Rewrite: Flush rules by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1247
  • Release 5.0.0 by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1248

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/compare/4.7.2...5.0.0
